headline: Incyte Corp (INCY) Price Target Hiked at UBS on Sales and Earnings Growth Prospects
summary: Incyte Corporation (NASDAQ:INCY) is one of the best biotech stocks to buy according to billionaire Steve Cohen. On July 15, UBS reiterated a ‘Neutral’ rating on the stock and increased its price target to $62 from $61. The price hike comes as UBS expects higher sales for Incyte’s Niktimvo, a treatment for chronic Graft-versus-Host Disease […]
